cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_address to '999.999.999.999' (invalid IP format) will cause network interface configuration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting local_n_address to '999.999.999.999' (invalid IP format) will cause network interface configuration failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 local_n_address 設定為 '999.999.999.999'（無效 IP 格式）會導致網路介面配置失敗。
